Bardeen.ai: Automating the Repetitive Tasks PMMs Hate

February 4, 2026 • Curated by Chris O'Hara

Bardeen.ai has emerged as a powerful automation tool that streamlines workflows through AI. Starting with a free plan and professional plans at just $10/month, it makes automation as simple as texting a friend. For PMMs drowning in repetitive tasks, this tool offers a path to significant productivity gains.

Automation Without Code

Whether you need to keep your CRM clean and updated, personalize outreach campaigns, or synchronize data across various tools, Bardeen handles it through natural language instructions. The platform integrates with HubSpot and over 100 other tools, making it easy to create automated workflows without technical expertise.

For PMMs, practical applications include automating competitive intelligence gathering, syncing product launch information across systems, creating personalized sales enablement materials, and maintaining consistent data across marketing and sales tools. With thousands of ready-to-use automation templates, getting started requires minimal setup time. This is automation built for marketers, not engineers.
